Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • geometricPrimitives.Shapes
      • geometricPrimitives.Rectangle
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Square

    public class Rectangle
extends Shapes
    A class implementing the behavior of a rectangle
    Author:
    Li Wing Yee
